info.name: CLASS LINE API Example
info.description:
สวัสดีครับทุกท่าน เราโอ๋ เทพนที โพธิ์จันทร์ [LINE API Expert]()

Postman Collection Class LINE API Expert นี้

ได้ทำไว้เพื่อเป็นประโยชน์ แก่สาธารณะ ห้ามมิให้นำไปใช้เชิงพาณิชย์

หวังให้เป็นประโยชน์แด่เพื่อนๆ ชาว LINE Developers ทุกท่าน ขอบคุณครับ

item.name: LINE Shoping API
Product API

request.description:
## Create product An API for product creation. For product Categories ID variable please find more information on [Development guideline](https://www.line-website.com/oaplus-public-api-doc-client/#tag/MyShopDevelopmentGuide) ##### AUTHORIZATIONS: [X-API-KEY](https://www.line-website.com/oaplus-public-api-doc-client/#section/Authentication/X-API-KEY) ##### REQUEST BODY SCHEMA: application/json create product request | brand |

string

Product brand

| | categoryIdrequired |

integer

Product category id

| | coderequired |

string

Product code

| | description |

string

Product description with HTML formatting support

| | imageUrlsrequired |

Array of strings non-empty

Product image urls

| | instantDiscount |

number

Product instant discount must be greater than 0. If instant discount amount is 0, the instant discount will be disabled.

| | namerequired |

string

Product name

| | variantOptions | object (product.ProductVariantOptions) | | variantsrequired |

Array of objects (product.ProductVariant) non-empty

Product variants

| ### Responses **201**  Success ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | brand |

string

Product brand name

| | category | object (product.Category) | | code |

string

Product code

| | description |

string

Product description with HTML formatting support

| | giftGroups |

Array of objects (product.GiftGroup)

Gift Groups of product

| | giftOption |

string

Product Gift Option

| | hasOnlyDefaultVariant |

boolean

If product doesn't have any variant will be returned 'true'

| | id |

integer

Identifying number of product

| | imageUrls |

Array of strings

Product images

| | instantDiscount |

number

If product doesn't have instant discount will be returned 'empty string' otherwise returned with number

| | isDisplay |

boolean

If product is displaying on storefront will be returned 'true'

| | name |

string

Product name

| | variantOptions |

Array of objects (product.VariantOption)

Product options such as size or color

| | variants |

Array of objects (product.Variant)

Product variants

| **400**  Bad request ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | code |

stringEnum: "BAD_REQUEST" "DATA_CONFLICT" "INTERNAL_ERROR" "NOT_FOUND" "PERMISSION_DENIED" "UNAUTHORIZED"

Error code

| | info |

object

Error info (optional)

| | message |

string

Error message

| | timestamp |

integer

Response timestamp

| **404**  Not found ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | code |

stringEnum: "BAD_REQUEST" "DATA_CONFLICT" "INTERNAL_ERROR" "NOT_FOUND" "PERMISSION_DENIED" "UNAUTHORIZED"

Error code

| | info |

object

Error info (optional)

| | message |

string

Error message

| | timestamp |

integer

Response timestamp

| **500**  Internal error ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | code |

stringEnum: "BAD_REQUEST" "DATA_CONFLICT" "INTERNAL_ERROR" "NOT_FOUND" "PERMISSION_DENIED" "UNAUTHORIZED"

Error code

| | info |

object

Error info (optional)

| | message |

string

Error message

| | timestamp |

integer

Response timestamp

|

request.description:
## Get all products An API for getting a list of products ##### AUTHORIZATIONS: [X-API-KEY](https://www.line-website.com/oaplus-public-api-doc-client/#section/Authentication/X-API-KEY) ##### QUERY PARAMETERS | ids |

Array of strings

Filtered by multiple values of product id

| | skus |

Array of strings

Filtered by multiple values of product sku

| | page |

integerDefault: 1

For pagination, page is the page number to query the list of products

| | perPage |

integer \[ 1 .. 100 \]Default: 25

For pagination, per page is the number of showing products on a page

| ### Responses **200**  Success ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | currentPage |

integer

Current page number

| | data | Array of objects (product.Response) | | perPage |

integer

Number of showing products per page

| | totalPage |

integer

Total page numbers of the result

| | totalRow |

integer

Total number of products

| **400**  Bad request ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | code |

stringEnum: "BAD_REQUEST" "DATA_CONFLICT" "INTERNAL_ERROR" "NOT_FOUND" "PERMISSION_DENIED" "UNAUTHORIZED"

Error code

| | info |

object

Error info (optional)

| | message |

string

Error message

| | timestamp |

integer

Response timestamp

| **404**  Not found ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | code |

stringEnum: "BAD_REQUEST" "DATA_CONFLICT" "INTERNAL_ERROR" "NOT_FOUND" "PERMISSION_DENIED" "UNAUTHORIZED"

Error code

| | info |

object

Error info (optional)

| | message |

string

Error message

| | timestamp |

integer

Response timestamp

| **500**  Internal error ##### RESPONSE SCHEMA: application/json | code |

stringEnum: "BAD_REQUEST" "DATA_CONFLICT" "INTERNAL_ERROR" "NOT_FOUND" "PERMISSION_DENIED" "UNAUTHORIZED"

Error code

| | info |

object

Error info (optional)

| | message |

string

Error message

| | timestamp |

integer

Response timestamp

|

item.description:
# Order

Manage your order via API

# Getting started

OAPlus public API allows you to integrate and manipulate your collected/stored data in our system. The API is based on REST principles supporting GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and PATCH request. API usage may be limited to the service allowed (such as MyCustomer API access) and some may be available for all users (such as LINE SHOPPING API)

## Issue an API key

In order to access our APIs, you will need an **Access Token**. As **Admin** role, you will first need to go to the **API key** page (located under Settings → API keys page from sidebar menu), then click the "Generate" button. You will then have generated an API Key **Access Token** as shown in the image below  
  
  

## Request headers

The following HTTP headers are included in API request.

| Header | Description | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- |
| User-Agents Optional | The User-Agent request header is a characteristic string that lets servers and network peers identify the application, operating system, vendor, and/or version of the requesting user agent. Suggestion value is your `service name`, or `company name`. | `User-Agent: OA Plus Platform` |

# Authentication

To authenticate and start using our APIs, you will need to send an [Access Token](https://www.line-website.com/oaplus-public-api-doc-client/#section/Getting-Started/Issue-an-API-Key) via `X-API-KEY` header in your API calls.

## X-API-KEY

| Security Scheme Type | API Key |
| Header parameter name: | X-API-KEY |

# Common specification

## Base URL

All URLs referenced in the documentation have the following base: [https://developers-oaplus.line.biz](https://developers-oaplus.line.biz/)  
For example

- [https://developers-oaplus.line.biz/audience/v1/group/groups](https://developers-oaplus.line.biz/audience/v1/group/groups)
- [https://developers-oaplus.line.biz/myshop/vi/products](https://developers-oaplus.line.biz/myshop/vi/products)
- [https://developers-oaplus.line.biz/myshop/v1/orders/{orderNo}/mark-as-paid](https://developers-oaplus.line.biz/myshop/v1/orders/{orderNo}/mark-as-paid)
    

## Possible response status codes

| Status Code | Description | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 200 | OK | The request was successful. |
| 400 | Bad Request | The request could not be understood by the server. Parameter might be invalid. |
| 401 | Unauthorized | The request might be contain invalid Channel Access Token. |
| 403 | Forbidden | Not authorized to access the resource. |
| 404 | Not Found | The requested resource is not found. |
| 429 | Too Many Request | The request is exceeded the rate limit. |
| 500 | Internal Server Error | The server could not return the representation due to an internal server error. |

## Rate limit

A rate limit is the number of API calls that can be made within a given time period. If this limit is exceeded, you will receive an error message saying, **429 Too Many Requests.**  
  

| API | Resource | Rate Limit Request |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Per Hour | Per Minute | Per Second |
| LINE SHOPPING API | Product API | \- | 1,000 | 50 |
| Order API | \- | 1,000 | 50 |
| Inventory API | \- | 1,000 | 50 |
| Other APIs | 5,000 | \- | 500 |
